articles.title: Passenger Bites Flight Attendant, Canadian Airline Joins the Jet Era, and Some Travel Regrets
articles.description: Here is the latest set of interesting stories and news from around the travel web that I find interesting and hope you do, too!
articles.content:

articles.author: Baylen Linnekin
articles.title: Canadian Steak Tartare Ban Leaves Chefs Feeling Raw
articles.description: Warning people about the dangers of raw meat doesn't require prohibiting the practice.
articles.content: A chef in New Brunswick, Canada, is aghast after learning of his province's ban of steak tartare, a dish he serves to customers that's typically made with raw beef and raw eggs. The ban came as a sur… [+5061 chars]
